decreaseBalance

decreaseAllowed(address,address,uint256).details: Decreases the tokens allowed to be spent.

params._spender: Address to decrease the allowance of.

decreaseBalance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the balance of the address.

params._owner: Address to decrease the balance of.

increaseAllowed(address,address,uint256).details: Increases the tokens allowed to be spent.

params._spender: Address to increase the allowance of.

increaseBalance(address,uint256).details: Increases the balance of the address.

params._owner: Address to increase the balance of.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setAllowed(address,address,uint256).details: Sets the value of tokens allowed to be spent.

params._spender: Address allowed to spend the tokens.
params._value: Value of tokens to be allowed to spend.

params._owner: Address to set the balance of.

setDecimals(uint256).details: Sets the total decimals of ERC-20 token.

params._decimals: Total decimals of the token to set.

setName(string).details: Sets the name of ERC-20 token.

params._name: Name of the token to set.

setSymbol(string).details: Sets the symbol of ERC-20 token.

params._symbol: Symbol of the token to set.

setTotalSupply(uint256).details: Sets the total supply of ERC-20 token.

params._totalSupply: Total supply of the token to set.

transferBalance(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers the balance from one address to another.

params._from: Address to transfer the balance from.
params._to: Address to transfer the balance to.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
